wordGroup: automobile industry 汽车产业，汽车业；汽车工业
automobile engine 汽车发动机引擎
automobile emission 汽车尾气排放
automobile tire 汽车轮胎；汽车车胎
automobile club n. 汽车俱乐部
automobile crane n. 汽车起重机

sentences.en: Thanks to the automobile, Americans soon had a freedom of movement previously unknown.
sentences.cn: 由于有了汽车，美国人很快就获得了前所未有的行动自由。

sentences.en: The parts of an automobile are standardized.
sentences.cn: 汽车零件是标准化了的。

sentences.en: Automobile accidents maim many people each year.
sentences.cn: 汽车车祸每年使许多人残废。
